Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Class Utility.RepeatCommands

Provides commands for managing message repeaters within the guild. Allows for setting up automated messages that can be repeated at specified intervals.

Inheritance
object

RepeatCommands(DiscordSocketClient, DbService)

Provides commands for managing message repeaters within the guild. Allows for setting up automated messages that can be repeated at specified intervals.

Declaration
public RepeatCommands(DiscordSocketClient client, DbService db)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client
DbService db

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Repeat(GuildDateTime?, StoopidTime?, string?)

Creates or updates a repeater with the given message, interval, and optional start time.

Declaration
[Cmd("Repeat")]
[Aliases("Repeat")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
[Priority(2)]
public Task Repeat(GuildDateTime? dt, StoopidTime? interval, string? message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
GuildDateTime dt

The date and time when the repeater should first run. Optional.
StoopidTime interval

The interval between each repetition. Required if no start time is specified.
string message

The message to be repeated. Can include placeholders for dynamic content.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Use either a start time (dt) or an interval, not both. Requires Manage Messages permission.

| Edit this page View Source

Repeat(GuildDateTime, string?)

Creates a new repeater with the specified message and time of day.

Declaration
[Cmd("Repeat")]
[Aliases("Repeat")]

[Priority(1)]
public Task Repeat(GuildDateTime dt, string? message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
GuildDateTime dt

The time of day at which to repeat the message.
string message

The message to repeat.
Returns

Repeat(StoopidTime, string?)

Creates a new repeater with the specified message and interval.

Declaration
[Cmd("Repeat")]
[Aliases("Repeat")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
[Priority(0)]
public Task Repeat(StoopidTime interval, string? message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
StoopidTime interval

The interval at which to repeat the message.
string message

The message to repeat.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation of creating a new repeater.

RepeatChannel(int, ITextChannel?)

Changes the channel where an existing repeater sends its message.

Declaration
[Cmd("RepeatChannel")]
[Aliases("RepeatChannel")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RepeatChannel(int index, ITextChannel? textChannel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The one-based index of the repeater to modify.
ITextChannel textChannel

The new channel for the repeater's messages.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Requires Manage Messages permission.

| Edit this page View Source

RepeatInvoke(int)

Invokes a repeater immediately by its index.

Declaration
[Cmd("RepeatInvoke")]
[Aliases("RepeatInvoke")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RepeatInvoke(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The one-based index of the repeater to invoke. The list of repeaters can be viewed with the RepeatList command.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

The repeater is reset after invocation. Requires Manage Messages permission.

| Edit this page View Source

RepeatList()

Lists all repeaters in the guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("RepeatList")]
[Aliases("RepeatList")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RepeatList()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Repeaters are listed with their index, message, interval, and next trigger time. Requires Manage Messages permission.

Updates the message of an existing repeater by its index.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description

string text

The new message for the repeater.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Requires Manage Messages permission.

| Edit this page View Source

RepeatRedundant(int)

Toggles the redundancy setting of a repeater by its index.

Declaration
[Cmd("RepeatRedundant")]
[Aliases("RepeatRedundant")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RepeatRedundant(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The one-based index of the repeater to modify.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

When enabled, the repeater will not trigger if the message is identical to the last. Requires Manage Messages permission.

| Edit this page View Source

RepeatRemove(int)

Removes a repeater by its index.

Declaration
[Cmd("RepeatRemove")]
[Aliases("RepeatRemove")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RepeatRemove(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The one-based index of the repeater to remove.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This action cannot be undone. Requires Manage Messages permission.
